name: minio-manager
description: Manage the MinIO Operator based on Nodes

scripts.k3d-setup: k3d cluster delete minio-manager && k3d cluster create minio-manager --agents=3 --k3s-arg '--debug@server:0' --wait && kubectl rollout status deployment -n kube-system
scripts.generate-crd: npx kubernetes-fluent-client crd https://raw.githubusercontent.com/minio/operator/a7dfa7c12072efa56c46d628d09ba29b3baa1c91/resources/base/crds/minio.min.io_tenants.yaml capabilities/generated && npx kubernetes-fluent-client crd k8s/miniomanager.crd.yaml capabilities/generated
